name: EuroMatchday
0:
”Alexa ask Euro Match Day for the matches”
”Fixtures”
”Get me the matches for today”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: euro match day
des: This Skill will tell you the results of the current Match Day of UEFA Euro 2016, The second biggest soccer tournament in the world which is currently in progress. If a match has yet to be played, it will inform the user of the kick off time in UTC. If the match has concluded, it will read out the final scores. If the match is in progress, it will report the live score.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
